summary: School daily report/attendance system: principal can edit daily reports for any date; edits persist to backend and reflect immediately on admin dashboard; date selection required before attendance; admin dashboard supports downloading reports.

existing_features.title: Remove any “today-only” restriction so principals (kepala sekolah) can view and edit daily reports for any selected date, including past dates, with no date-based edit lockouts.

Ensure saving an edited daily report persists immediately to the backend for the currently selected date (date-scoped overwrite for that day), and the principal dashboard shows the updated saved version after the save completes.
Make the admin dashboard automatically reflect the latest saved report data after a principal edits/saves a report (for the same selected date), without requiring a manual full-page reload.
Add a required date selection step before taking attendance (absen) in the principal flow, so the user explicitly chooses a report date before completing attendance-related inputs.
Add a report download feature on the admin dashboard to download reports for the currently selected date.

new_feature_requests.summary: Allow principal to edit daily reports without any date restriction (not limited to today)
Persist edited daily report data immediately to the backend upon edit/save
Admin dashboard automatically shows the latest updated report version (auto-refresh/update after edits)
Show a date picker/selection step before doing attendance (absen)
Add report download feature to the admin dashboard

projectName: Rebuild: Unrestricted daily report editing by date, date selection before attendance, and admin report download
